meta.description: Scoring rubric for multi-agent review system evaluating information coverage, detail, and writing style
meta.factual_correctness_note: This rubric explicitly de-emphasizes factual correctness in favor of coverage, detail, and style

coverage.name: Information Coverage
coverage.description: Completeness and breadth of information addressing the question or task

excellent.description: Comprehensive coverage of all relevant aspects, addresses question fully, covers edge cases and nuances

good.description: Good coverage of main points, addresses most relevant aspects, minor gaps in completeness

adequate.description: Adequate coverage of basic requirements, some important aspects covered but gaps remain

poor.description: Incomplete coverage, misses several important aspects, addresses question partially

inadequate.description: Very poor coverage, fails to address most aspects of the question, significant gaps

detail_specificity.name: Detail & Specificity
detail_specificity.description: Depth of detail, specificity of information, concrete examples and evidence

excellent.description: Rich detail with specific examples, concrete evidence, precise terminology, actionable information

good.description: Good level of detail with some specific examples, mostly concrete information

adequate.description: Adequate detail level, some specifics provided, mixture of concrete and general information

poor.description: Limited detail, mostly general statements, few specific examples or evidence

inadequate.description: Very little detail, vague generalities, lacks specificity and concrete information

structure_coherence.name: Structure & Coherence
structure_coherence.description: Logical organization, clear flow of ideas, coherent presentation

excellent.description: Exceptionally well-organized, clear logical flow, excellent transitions, easy to follow

good.description: Well-organized structure, good logical flow, mostly clear presentation

adequate.description: Reasonable organization, some logical flow, generally coherent but may have minor issues

poor.description: Poor organization, unclear flow, some incoherent sections, difficult to follow

inadequate.description: Very poor structure, incoherent presentation, confusing organization

style_tone.name: Style & Tone
style_tone.description: Appropriate writing style, professional tone, readability and engagement

excellent.description: Excellent writing style, appropriate tone, engaging and professional, highly readable

good.description: Good writing style, appropriate tone, readable and professional

adequate.description: Adequate writing style, generally appropriate tone, reasonably readable

poor.description: Poor writing style, inappropriate tone, difficult to read, unprofessional

inadequate.description: Very poor writing, highly inappropriate tone, very difficult to read

instruction_following.name: Instruction Following
instruction_following.description: Adherence to specific instructions, format requirements, and task constraints

excellent.description: Perfect adherence to all instructions, follows format precisely, meets all constraints

good.description: Good adherence to instructions, follows most requirements, minor deviations

adequate.description: Adequate instruction following, meets basic requirements, some deviations

poor.description: Poor instruction following, misses several requirements, significant deviations

inadequate.description: Fails to follow most instructions, ignores format and constraints

evaluation_guidelines.factual_correctness_note: Factual correctness is explicitly de-emphasized. Focus on how well information is presented, organized, and detailed rather than whether it is factually accurate.
evaluation_guidelines.bias_considerations: Evaluate based on information presentation quality, not agreement with evaluator's perspectives
evaluation_guidelines.context_sensitivity: Consider the specific question/task context when evaluating appropriateness of detail and coverage
